title: Jahan Records Khatam Ho Jaate Hain
description: The investigation into the 'Urgent Transfer' continues, moving from the abandoned factory to the physical evidence left behind, revealing a hidden destination code.
previousSummary: Is kahani ki shuruaat ek aise case se hoti hai jiska koi official record poora nahi hai. Records ke mutaabik, is case ka pehla entry ek purani file mein milta hai. Last Known Narration mein pata chala ki case ko 'Urgent Transfer' kiya gaya tha, aur woh transfer order khud ek aise department se aaya tha jiska koi official wajood hi nahi tha. Jahan records khatam ho jaate hain, wahan sawal shuru hote hain. Factory ke bahar, hamein ek chota sa security booth mila. Booth ke andar, dhool mein daba hua, ek handwritten register tha. Us logbook mein, us raat ki entry thi: 'Late night delivery. One package, transferred from Railway Station.' Aur uske aage, woh aadha mita hua naam dobara likha hua tha. Jahan records khatam ho jaate hain, wahan personal diaries sach bolti hain.
script:
Logbook mein woh aadha mita hua naam dobara likha hua tha. Humne us naam ko forensic analysis ke liye bheja. Records ke mutaabik, yeh naam ek junior clerk ka tha, jo 1974 mein Railway Parcel Office mein kaam karta tha. Lekin uski service history mein, us raat ki koi official duty record nahi thi.

Factory ke andar, logbook ki entry ne hamein ek purane loading dock tak pahunchaya. Yahan dhool ki parat zyaada gehri thi, lekin ek jagah par, dhool saaf ki gayi thi. Jaise koi bada dabba ghasita gaya ho. Uske theek upar, deewar par, ek chota sa metal plate laga tha. Us par sirf do akshar the: 'P.H.'

Yeh 'P.H.' Project Phoenix ka short form ho sakta tha. Plate ke neeche, ek chota sa trapdoor tha, jo cement se band kiya gaya tha. Jab humne us cement ko hataya, toh andar ek chota, hawa band kamra mila. Yeh kamra khali tha. Lekin records ke mutaabik, yeh 'Active Holding Site' tha.

Kamre ki deewaron par, humein koi nishaan nahi mila, siwaye ek kone mein. Wahan, zameen par, ek chota sa brass rivet pada tha. Yeh rivet kisi aam box ka nahi tha. Yeh military-grade transport crate mein istemaal hota tha. Aur us rivet ke neeche, mitti mein daba hua, ek chota sa paper slip tha.

Paper slip par sirf teen cheezein likhi thi: Ek tareekh (1974 ki), ek weight (45 kilograms), aur ek destination code: 'Yard 7-Delta.' Yeh destination code Railway Freight Yard ke ek aise hisse ka tha jo 1980s mein permanently band kar diya gaya tha. Jahan records khatam ho jaate hain, wahan yeh chote tukde hamein aage ka rasta dikhate hain.
